snippet: Fred Baldwin and Wendy Watriss sought to change the world through words and pictures. Their influence has been felt in the United States and abroad, as they encourage photographers and inspire photo festivals.
abstract: Fred Baldwin and Wendy Watriss sought to change the world through words and pictures. Their influence has been felt in the United States and abroad, as they encourage photographers and inspire photo festivals.

headline.main: Partners in Words, Pictures and Life
